contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Zollernia'' |image=Zollernia latifolia Benth..jpg |image_caption=Zollernia latifolia | regnum = [[Plantae]] | unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] | unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] | unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] | ordo = [[Fabales]] | familia = [[Fabaceae]] | subfamilia = [[Faboideae]] | tribus = [[Swartzieae]] | genus = '''''Zollernia''''' | genus_authority = Maximil. & [[Christian Gottfried Daniel Nees von Esenbeck|Nees]] | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = ''Zollernia glabra''<br/> ''Zollernia glaziovii''<br/> ''Zollernia grandifolia''<br/> ''Zollernia ilicifolia''<br/> ''Zollernia kanukuensis''<br/> ''Zollernia latifolia''<br/> ''Zollernia paraensis'' <br/> ''Zollernia splendens'' Ref: [http://www.ildis.org/ ILDIS Version 6.05] }} '''''Zollernia''''' is a genus of the family [[Fabaceae]] native to [[Central America|Central]] and [[South America]]. ''Zollernia'' are trees or shrubs that flower annually. Leaves of ''Zollernia ilicifolia'' are used medicinally as an [[analgesic]] and [[antiulcerogenic]] by the peoples of the [[Brazil]]ian Tropical Atlantic [[Rainforest]]. [[Category:Faboideae]] {{fabaceae-tree-stub}}
